attr.name: cat$
attr.longdesc: Each item can belong to one of the following categories: textbooks, notebooks, stationery, or reference books.

attr.name: mrp
attr.longdesc: The maximum retail price of the item in INR as declared by the manufacturer.

attr.name: fullname
attr.longdesc: The full human-readable name of the item. Not unique, therefore sometimes confusing.

attr.name: ageinstock
attr.longdesc: The age in days that the oldest sample of this item has been lying in stock

attr.name: inventoryqty
attr.longdesc: How many of these items are currently present in the inventory
